item.description: About Me Link to heading Hello, my name is James Oswald! I am PhD student at Rensselaer Polytechnic Institute and graduate researcher with the The Rensselaer Artificial Intelligence and Reasoning (RAIR) Laboratory, under Professor Selmer Bringsjord. My primary research interest is in Artificial Intelligence (AI), particularly Artificial General Intelligence (AGI), that is, how we can best create single AI agents that preforms well on general tasks. The rest of my research interests such as machine learning, modal logic, and cognitive architectures all stem from my interest in AGI design.

Contact Link to heading If you contact me on anything besides these three, it is unlikely I will see it. Discord: TenebrisLux#8358 Personal Email: jamesoswald111@gmail.com School Email: oswalj@rpi.edu
